column4: I do a  sudo loadkeys fi-latin1, but and get a Loading echo, but still have the same layout.
How do I change my keyboard layout?
from the System -> Preferences -> Keyboard app

that doesn't work either. I add a keyboard, move it to the top, and gnome changes through all my desktop themes, gives me an error message on some missing icon in one of them, and I'm back at square one.
